Description: Previously valuable customers who haven't purchased recently
Recommended_Action: Win-back campaigns, personalized offers, re-engagement emails

Description: High-value customers who purchase frequently and recently
Recommended_Action: Reward loyalty, offer exclusive perks, early access to new products

Description: Inactive customers with low engagement and old last purchase
Recommended_Action: Low-cost reactivation campaigns, survey for feedback, or remove from active marketing

Description: New customers with recent engagement but low purchase history
Recommended_Action: Nurture with onboarding, educational content, first-purchase incentives
